summary: A SKSE plugin that shows petty souls who's boss.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=#FF8C00]Smart Souls[/color][/b][/size]
[size=3][color=#9ACD32][b]Teaching petty souls the meaning of the word 'Hog'[/b][/color][/size]
[b]version 9.0[/b]

[size=3][b]Requires [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]Skyrim Script Extender[/url][/b][/size][/center]


[b][u]Description[/u][/b]

This mod knocks some sense into the souls of the various denizens of Skyrim, keeping them from entering soul gems that aren't of the same level/quality as they are. Also displays the quality of the soul being captured. And prevents black soul gems from providing refuge to white souls.


[size=2]PS: Dragon souls aren't covered by this mod as they are too far gone to be rehabilitated.[/size]



[b][u]Fine Print[/u][/b]

Just pop it in and run the game through the SKSE launcher. The INI file will be created on first-run, in the same folder as the plugin.

Specific soul gems can be allowed to store lower quality souls by adding their formIDs to the INI, like so:
[AzurasStarImposters]
GrandSoulGemVanilla=0006AB34
GreaterSoulGemFromSomeMod=000084AC



[u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u]

Compatible only with TES Skyrim v1.9.32.0. May not be compatible with the Russian build of the game.



[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]

[color=#F4A460][i]Special thanks[/i][/color] to :[list]
[*]Ian Patterson, Stephen Abel and Paul Connelly (The SKSE Team) – Words fail me when I attempt to extol these guys for th-heir c-contributio... to ..he TES modd..n. com.i..t...
[*]LHammonds – For his Readme generator.
[*]AndalayBay - Am yet to think of a good reason.
[/list]
The Rest of the Modding Community – For the inspiration I needed to start modding and all the wonderful mods which I use.
Bethesda – For providing a rather malleable game.


[u][b]Change Log[/b][/u]

[spoiler][quote]9.0 - Updated for v1.9.32.0, added INI toggles for features.
8.0 – Updated for v1.8.151.0, extended the Azura’s Star exception to custom soul gems.
7.0 – Updated for v1.7.7.0.
6.0 - Transmogrified into a build that supports v1.6.89.0.
5.0 - Updated for v1.5.26.0 after receiving 2 metric tonnes of unprocessed vanilla from an unknown benefactor.
4.0 - Updated for v1.4.21.0, added exception to allow the Azura's Star to hold sub-grand souls.
3.0 - Updated for v1.3.10.0, escape notification message displays the quality of the soul, made notification enhancements toggle-able through an INI file.
2.1 - Fixed a bug with black soul gems.
2.0 - Updated for v1.3.7.0, capture notification message now mentions the quality of the soul.
1.0 - Initial Release.[/quote][/spoiler]
author: shadeMe
